title: ISic020565. ISic020565
body:
Facsimile Images

Τίτᾱ ε̄̓́μι

Apparatus criticus

Text after Arena (IGASM 2)

English translation

I belong to Titas.

Italian translation

Appartengo a Titas.

commentary

Inscription of ownership from the sacred area of Sabucina. Arena and Dubois suggest that Τίτᾱ is an anthroponym from the adjective τίτας of Cretan origin (cf. Inscriptiones Creticae IV.15, found in Gortyna, where it is presumably the title of a magistrate).

bibliography

  • Arena 2002 106 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001373
  • Dubois 1989 171 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000187
  • Agostiniani, Prosdocimi 1976-1977 230 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002611
  • Dell'Aira 1965-1966 156-157, no. 79, pl. 19 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002479
  • Orlandini 1965 458, no. 8, pl. IV.1 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002498
  • Orlandini 1962 102, pl. 25.5 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001465
